ISSUE.TITLE: Change secret_key and re-encrypt credentials
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY Currently it seems not possible to change the awx **secret_key** (from installer/inventory) to be able to change the credential encryption key - or is it possible? Will this be supported in the future?
